pkgmetadata.longdescription: Welcome to django-rest-auth===========================.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/Tivix/django-rest-auth.svg :target: https://travis-ci.org/Tivix/django-rest-auth.. image:: https://coveralls.io/repos/Tivix/django-rest-auth/badge.svg :target: https://coveralls.io/r/Tivix/django-rest-auth?branch=master.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/django-rest-auth/badge/?version=latest :target: https://readthedocs.org/projects/django-rest-auth/?badge=latestDjango-rest-auth provides a set of REST API endpoints for Authentication and RegistrationDocumentation-------------http://django-rest-auth.readthedocs.org/en/latest/Source code-----------https://github.com/Tivix/django-rest-authStack Overflow-----------http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/django-rest-auth
